approach.title: My approach
approach.description: I believe in a methodical approach to development that focuses on clarity, collaboration, and excellence.
approach.phase1Description: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation, and content requirements.
approach.phase2Description: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.
approach.phase3Description: This is where the magic happens! Based on the approved design, I'll translate everything into functional code, building your website from the ground up.
